Instruction Contact Contact Us Join E-Club Instruction Professional Golf Instruction Assistant Golf Professional Lauren Lamm 2-Time All-American at UWF Ranked 3rd in Nation in Division II All-Decade 1st Team Gulf South Conference Level 1 Certified First Tee Coach Level 2 PGA Associate Lauren’s Lesson Prices 1 Hour Adult Lesson: $100.00 3 Lesson Package: $250.00 1 Hour Member Lesson: $70.00 Playing Lesson: $185.00 (Greens Fees Are Included) Junior Golf Lesson: $70.00 (High School & Under) Short Game Lesson : $60.00 To book a lesson with Lauren Lamm, please contact her at: Cell: (850) 860-1212 Email: lauren@marcuspointegc.com First Tee Registrations: https://firsttee.my.site.com/parentRegistration/s/add-to-cart?website=www.firstteegulfcoast.org&language=en_US&session=a0HUH000007P6m9 Page Footer Contact Us Address : 2500 Oak Pointe Drive, Pensacola, FL 32505 Email : rbensley@marcuspointegc.com Phone : (850) 484-9770 Marcus Pointe Golf Club | 2500 Oak Pointe Drive, Pensacola, FL 32505 | (850) 484-9770 Copyright © 2025 Marcus Pointe Golf Club All Rights Reserved. Leagues - Marcus Pointe Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Facebook Instagram Join Our Team Event Calendar Join E-Club Marcus Pointe Golf Club Home Tee Times Course Details Course Information Rates Leagues Agronomy A Broken Tee at Marcus Pointe Golf Club Events Event Calendar Special Events Tournament & Event Request Memberships Membership Info Member Statements Member Tee Times Meet Us! Instruction Contact Contact Us Join E-Club Leagues Marcus Pointe Ladies Golf Association MPLGA plays every Tuesday at 9:00 A.M. League play begins September 1st, and runs through June 30th. All ages and handicaps are welcome to join in play! Yearly dues are $45.00. Interested? Please contact Jan Von Holten at jvhrdh@gmail.com or (702)-349-3911 . Thursday Night League The Thursday Night League will resume in March of 2024. It is a two-person team with rotating formats and prizes weekly. Each time you play, you accumulate points, and at the last event, there will be an awards cookout and prizes. It’s a great time to relax, play a little golf, and have some FUN!! We here at Marcus Pointe Golf Club, are “Putting the fun back in golf!” Click Here For League Website → lauren@marcuspointegc.c om Couples Night League The Couples Night League will resume in the spring of 2024. Format and start times vary throughout the season. Contact the Pro Shop for more information at 850-484-9770, Ext. #1. lauren@marcuspointegc.co m Page Footer Contact Us Address : 2500 Oak Pointe Drive, Pensacola, FL 32505 Email : rbensley@marcuspointegc.com Phone : (850) 484-9770 Marcus Pointe Golf Club | 2500 Oak Pointe Drive, Pensacola, FL 32505 | (850) 484-9770 Copyright © 2025 Marcus Pointe Golf Club All Rights Reserved. You can use the online contact form below, where your message will be dealt with as appropriate, or alternatively contact us on the telephone numbers below. Alternatively, you can send an email to the following email address: info@belfairsgolfclub.co.uk . We will only use the above information to contact you about your query. Our golf course in Pensacola, Florida sits on 600 acres of rolling woodlands with convenience to beautiful Gulf Coast beaches. Created by Earl Stone, this classic course boasts natural beauty and maximum playability. We offer professional golf lessons and a casual dining experience. Marcus Pointe Golf Club, while a great value, is one of the top golf facilities along the Gulf Coast. Meeting Space Meeting Space Largest Room: 1500 sq. ft. Meeting Rooms: 1 Classroom Capacity: 42 Reception Capacity: 75 Banquet Capacity: 65 Theater Capacity: 45 Marcus Pointe Golf Club 2500 Oak Pointe Drive Pensacola, FL 32505 (850) 484-9770 Save Website Email Events Save October 3 Northeast Sertoma Charity Classic golf event West Pensacola North Pensacola Hello, fellow Pensacolans as well as those living and/or visiting the Gulf Coast Area! NE Pensacola Sertoma is hosting the Northeast Sertoma Charity Classic golf event in October, 2025. All proceeds will benefit the Gulf Coast Kids House. This will be an exciting day with food, drinks, and outdoor fun. Whether participating as a golf team or purely a spectator, this will prove to be a great time for all and provide a boost for a very worthy cause. Instruction Contact Contact Us Join E-Club Join E-Club Want a Free Greens Fee for your birthday? Sign up here! You do not have to use this on your exact birthday–you have a window of 10 days before or after your birthday. Free Greens Fee for your birthday is valid weekdays anytime, weekends after 2pm. Winter Birthday? No worries! If your birthday is between Nov 1 and March 30, you have until April 30 to use your Free Greens Fee. Please bring your license with you for verification when you check in for your round. Page Footer Contact Us Address : 2500 Oak Pointe Drive, Pensacola, FL 32505 Email : rbensley@marcuspointegc.com Phone : (850) 484-9770 Marcus Pointe Golf Club | 2500 Oak Pointe Drive, Pensacola, FL 32505 | (850) 484-9770 Copyright © 2025 Marcus Pointe Golf Club All Rights Reserved. Instruction Contact Contact Us Join E-Club welcome to Marcus pointe Golf club Book Now Learn More Join Us For Weekly Fun! Join us for an exciting evening of Trivia Night on Wednesday from 6 PM to 8 PM! This is a great opportunity to meet new friends, enjoy delicious food, and savor a refreshing drink at the bar—all while challenging yourself with some fun trivia questions. This event is open to everyone, so feel free to bring a friend, family member, or special someone! To stay up-to-date with what’s happening at the golf club, follow us on Facebook: Facebook More than just a golf club Our golf course in Pensacola, Florida sits on 600 acres of rolling woodlands with convenience to beautiful Gulf Coast beaches. Created by Earl Stone, this classic course boasts natural beauty and maximum playability. We offer professional golf lessons and a casual dining experience. Marcus Pointe Golf Club, while a great value, is one of the top golf facilities along the Gulf Coast. To book a tee time, please call the proshop at (850) 484-9770, extension 1 . Call Today What to Expect Explore the Course TEE TIMES Tee times are now available up to 7 days in advance. Book Now MEMBERSHIP Take your love of the game to the next level! Member Info UPCOMING EVENTS Stay up to date with upcoming events at the club. Calendar JOIN THE CLUB MEMBERSHIP HAS ITS PRIVILEGES Score savings and exclusive offers by becoming a member. For more information regarding membership you can contact the golf shop, at 850.484.9770 or online. Learn More Excellent course, very well maintained and some nice challenging holes. The views are amazing and the course play is challenging but enjoyable. They offer military and first responders discounts which is a plus. – JIMMIE RODGERS UPCOMING EVENTS AT MARCUS POINTE Event Calendar play the round of your life Book Now Page Footer Contact Us Address : 2500 Oak Pointe Drive, Pensacola, FL 32505 Email : rbensley@marcuspointegc.com Phone : (850) 484-9770 Marcus Pointe Golf Club | 2500 Oak Pointe Drive, Pensacola, FL 32505 | (850) 484-9770 Copyright © 2025 Marcus Pointe Golf Club All Rights Reserved.
